sentences.cn: 一名终身的保守党党员

sentences.en: And I'll tell you now, no son of Tory will ever submit to a foreign ruler.
sentences.cn: 我现在就告诉你, 特洛伊的子民永远不会屈服于外来的统治者.

sentences.en: Annie: Would you please introduce to us something about the his - tory of table tennis?
sentences.cn: 安妮: 请你介绍一下乒乓球的历史好 吗 ?

sentences.en: At supper, Mr. Wang gave us the news about the vic - tory.
sentences.cn: (晚餐时, 王先生告诉我们有关胜利的消息. )

sentences.en: For now, the prospect of a general - election victory has plaster - casted the most painful Tory fractures.
sentences.cn: 这就是让粗犷的肯卡拉克回到议会前排的部分原因.

sentences.en: Helen of Tory was beautiful beyond expression.
sentences.cn: 特洛伊城的海伦美丽得无法形容.

sentences.en: Historicalism, implying a focus on Eurocentralism and content determinism a deficient view of his 2 tory.
sentences.cn: “历史主义”是一种隐含“欧洲中心主义”和“内容决定论”的局限性极大的历史观.

sentences.en: Satisfac - tory predictions were obtained by this method in 694 newborns with ABO incom - patible parents.
sentences.cn: 对694例夫妇ABO血型不合的孕妇预报结果较为满意.

sentences.en: That pleased Tory Eurosceptics but waved goodbye to much influence.
sentences.cn: 这让ToryEurosceptics高兴之余,在很大影响上也挥手告别.

sentences.en: Today's teachers are not the ranging extremists of TORY and tabloid mythology.
sentences.cn: 今天的老师不属于托利时代的极端分子和小报的神话.

sentences.en: Who is Tory Foster's predecessor in President Roslin's office?
sentences.cn: 在罗丝琳总统办公室里,谁是陶莉·斯特的前任?

trans.tran_en: of, characteristic of, or relating to Tories
